message: Starting investigation of parameter control command processing flow
Found key components: parameter_control_listener.py uses parameter_name lookups, command_flow handles set_parameter commands via parameter_id. Investigating PLC interface layer next.
Completed comprehensive analysis of parameter control flow. Identified all affected files and the specific changes needed for component_parameter_id migration.

Investigation complete. Provided comprehensive analysis, identified root cause, and delivered detailed implementation plan with backward compatibility strategy for migrating to component_parameter_id.
